response.overview: I experienced palpitations and significant anxiety due to excessive caffeine intake, reminiscent of a seizure, with images flashing rapidly in my mind. It reminded me of a scientific fact shared by my biology teacher: babies may experience mild convulsions in hot showers, suggesting that we might all begin with mild seizures that can escalate over time. Reflecting on the tension we endure throughout life, I pondered whether childhood itself could be considered a mild seizure. I attempted to convey this concept solely through visual language and emotion in my film.
response.tagline: Babies have mild convulsions when they take a wa﻿rm shower.
response.title: Caffeine
